description: This file defines the UI for an Expense Tracker screen using Jetpack Compose. It includes components for displaying a month header, summary cards for income, expense, and balance, a form to add or edit transactions, and a list of existing transactions with edit and delete actions.

classes.name: FormState
classes.description: Data class representing the state of the transaction form, including date, category, title, value, and editing ID.

methods.name: ExpenseTrackerScreen
methods.description: Main composable function that renders the entire expense tracker UI, including header, summary, form, and transaction list.

methods.name: MonthHeader
methods.description: Displays the current month with navigation buttons to move to previous or next month.

methods.name: SummaryCards
methods.description: Shows summary cards for income, expenses, and balance.

methods.name: SummaryCard
methods.description: Renders an individual summary card with a title, value, and color accent.

methods.name: TransactionForm
methods.description: Form to add or edit a transaction, including validation and submission logic.

methods.name: CategoryRow
methods.description: Displays category options for selection using filter chips.

methods.name: TransactionList
methods.description: Displays a list of transactions with options to edit or delete entries.

methods.name: hexToColor
methods.description: Utility function to convert hex color strings to Color objects.
